Please take a look here for more info: http://board.prometeus.net/viewtopic.php?f=8&t=900&sid=519cf8e684056ea48f424e8abc98c2a1
Coupon code (only applies to existing customers as these plans are meant mostly for our customers): **50OFF6MONTH**

**FTP Backup 10**

10 GB Disk space
100 GB Traffic on 100 mbps shared port

Order link: https://my.iperweb.com/cart/other-shared-services/

We restocked some of these plans as the initial stock was gone too fast after customers read our newsletter at the beginning of the year, however, they wont be lasting forever (except the FTP backup space), so grab them now while they last !

**Prometeus** is focused since 1997 solely on high-quality, high-reliability web services and professional consulting. Our network and servers are tuned specifically for maximum performance, and our policies ensure that we remain as efficient as possible.
We are located in Milan, Italy and have 5 racks collocated in the largest campus/internet exchange of Italy. We are LIR (RIPE NCC member) and do BGP with our Autonomous System Number (AS34971) and a total bandwidth capacity of 10Gb.

The only accepted payment method is Paypal, for now. VAT 21% is added if you are an EU citizen/company without a valid VAT ID for Prometeus sites only, products of Iperweb LTD are VAT-free right now.
